act_info.full_title: Holodomor Memorial Day Act, 2009, S.O. 2009, c. 7
act_info.citation: Holodomor Memorial Day Act, 2009, S.O. 2009, c. 7

content.content: 1. Throughout Ontario, the fourth Saturday in November in each year is proclaimed Holodomor Memorial Day to memorialize those who perished as victims of genocide by famine that occurred in Ukraine from 1932 to 1933. 2009, c. 7, s. 1. 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2009, c. 7, s. 2. 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2009, c. 7, s. 3. ______________ Français
content.raw_html:
1. Throughout Ontario, the fourth Saturday in November in each year is proclaimed Holodomor Memorial Day to memorialize those who perished as victims of genocide by famine that occurred in Ukraine from 1932 to 1933. 2009, c. 7, s. 1.

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2009, c. 7, s. 2.

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2009, c. 7, s. 3.

______________

Français
